fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with 5 random abilities from any roles in the game, they must not rely on any other Ability/Attribute to be useful.
- You may multitask, if you use an ability, you must use all your abilities on a single night, and on different valid targets if applicable.
- The first time you would die, you death will be delayed to the start of the next phase same to the one you died, and you will be notified.
- Roleblock, Redirect and Control immune.
